entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-12-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Benchmark stopped running: basicgrpcgo #52694
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicgrpcpublishaot, basicgrpcpublishaot, basicgrpcvanilla #52693
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicgrpcvanilla, todosapipublishaot, todosapipublishaot #52692
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicminimalapipublishaot, todosapivanilla, todosapivanilla #52691
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicminimalapipublishaot, basicminimalapivanilla, basicminimalapivanilla #52690
  • Blazor 8 SSR cannot change Pagetitle when StreamRendering is true #52689
  • Continuous browser reloading while navigating within AuthorizeView razor page #52686
  • "Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.DataAnnotations.Validation" is still in preview #52685
  • Chinese characters are encoded incorrectly in .Net 8 Blazor Web App despite using HtmlEncoder.Create(UnicodeRanges.All) #52683
  • UserAuthorizationFailed log message loses information about FailureReasons #52682

Closed

  • bool IDataProtector.TryUnprotect() #51508
  • Perf regression: fortunes_ef #52671

PullRequests

Created

  • Set IExceptionHandlerFeature on DeveloperExceptionPageMiddleware #52688
    feature-diagnostics, community-contribution, area-middleware
  • Use CreateAsyncScope instead of CreateScope for ExceptionHandler middleware #52687
    feature-diagnostics, community-contribution, area-middleware
  • Update devcontainer Dockerfile #52681
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution

Merged

  • [2.1] Fix IPNetwork.Contains for prefixes which are not at start of subnet range. #50967
    Servicing-approved, area-infrastructure, area-networking, area-middleware, 2.1.x

Updated

  • Add null check for connectionId #52672
    area-signalr, community-contribution
  • Fix metrics duration and http.route tag with exception handling #52652
    area-hosting
  • signalr `DefaultDisconectTimeout` typo #52599
    area-signalr, community-contribution
  • Make ValueStopwatch readonly #52496
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-networking
  • Revert "Unskip HelixPlatform_QuicListenerIsSupported on debian 12 (#52235) #52674
    area-networking
  • Supporting pseudo-element attribute in css link fallback (#38146) #51396
    area-mvc, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
